scripts.build: go mod tidy && go build -o build/byteroute-client ./cmd/byteroute-client
scripts.build:docker: docker build -f Dockerfile.static -t byteroute-client-builder . && docker create --name byteroute-temp byteroute-client-builder && mkdir -p build && docker cp byteroute-temp:/byteroute-client build/byteroute-client && docker rm byteroute-temp
scripts.coverage: go test ./... -coverprofile=coverage.out -covermode=atomic && go tool cover -func=coverage.out | tail -1
